entry.title: Bayc, Ape, the Otherside and Kodas – Everything You Need to Know
entry.summary: Let’s talk Silos, powerful containers of value but limited by their size. The vast majority of crypto communities are silos. Powerful yes, but limited by their ability to reach the level of universality that defines mega success. But there are clear examples of projects that have transcended their boundaries becoming a layer above the silos. … Bayc, Ape, the Otherside and Kodas – Everything You Need to Know Read More »
